Title: Follow the Clues
Description:
<Investigator Erima reviews the map.>

It is clear what the X scrawled over the Seat of the Aspects represents.

But there is also a circle drawn around the Misty Vale. Perhaps this is the rebels' next target? Or a base of operations.

Only one way to find out. Meet me at the Vale.
ObjectivesText: Meet Investigator Erima at the Misty Vale.
RewardText:
This is definitely a base of operations.

The Misty Vale is crawling with rebels... and Primalists!
